name: Rail Assembly
description:
Unfortunately, the game is not in a playable state.

The idea was to have scattered tracks available that you could click and drag to create a track for the train to follow. However, real life interfered and we were unable to iron out the bugs in time.

Regardless, we are proud of our work and what we accomplished.

So, I guess, please enjoy our menu and loading screen.

Updates will come that will bring this into a playable game!

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com
